register-form.title: Sign up and join us!
register-form.welcome-text: Fill out the form to create your account. After registering, you'll receive an email with a confirmation link. Don't worry, we won't flood you with spam ‚Äì we promise to only remind you of us in a positive way! We‚Äôre waiting for you!
register-form.privacy-policy-label: I acknowledge and accept the terms and privacy policy.

account-confirmation-link-modal.title: Confirm Your Account ‚Äì Your Ticket to Success!
account-confirmation-link-modal.content: A magical link has been sent to your email address. Click it to confirm your account and unlock new opportunities. If the email got lost (perhaps exploring the spam folder), be sure to check there! üòâ Let‚Äôs do this ‚Äì your digital success is waiting!

account-already-exists-modal.title: Oops, this account already exists!
account-already-exists-modal.content: It seems like there‚Äôs already an account registered with this email address. Maybe it‚Äôs the perfect time to dust off that password? üòâ If you need help, click 'Forgot Password' ‚Äì we promise it won‚Äôt hurt!

forgot-password-form.title: Forgot your password?
forgot-password-form.text: Enter your email address, and we'll send you a link to reset your password. We promise it‚Äôll be quick, easy, and math-test-free! üòä

reset-password-link-sent-modal.title: Password reset link sent!
reset-password-link-sent-modal.content: We've sent an email with a link to reset your password. Please check your inbox (and spam folder just in case) and follow the instructions.

login-form.title: Welcome back!
login-form.text: Log in to return to your world. We promise your data is safe ‚Äì we guard it like treasure! üòä

account-does-not-exists-modal.title: Account not found
account-does-not-exists-modal.content: It seems the provided email address is not associated with any account. Would you like to create a new account and join us?

reset-password-form.title: Set a New Password
reset-password-form.content: Time for a fresh start! Please enter your new password and confirm it below. Make sure it's secure ‚Äî ideally, it should be at least 8 characters long and include uppercase letters, numbers, and special symbols. If needed, use the show password option to double-check your entry. Don't worry, we won't judge your password choice! üòÑ

password-changed-modal.title: Password Changed Successfully!
password-changed-modal.content: Your new password is now active. You can log in and continue using our platform. üîê

account-confirmation-waiting.title: Confirming your account...
account-confirmation-waiting.text: Please hold on, we‚Äôre checking your account status. This will only take a moment ‚Äì we promise it‚Äôs not like waiting in line at the DMV! üòä

account-confirmation-success.title: Account successfully confirmed!
account-confirmation-success.text: Your account has been confirmed. You can now fully enjoy everything our platform has to offer. We're thrilled to have you with us! üöÄ

account-confirmation-error.title: Oops, something went wrong!
account-confirmation-error.text: We couldn‚Äôt confirm your account. The link might have expired or something went wrong on our end. Try again or reach out to support ‚Äì we‚Äôre here to help! üôå

save-invoice-company-details-confirmatio.title: Saving your data was successful!
save-invoice-company-details-confirmatio.message: You can always edit it in your profile

password.must-match-password-regex: Password must include at least one lowercase letter, one uppercase letter, one number, one special character (@, $, !, %, *, ?, &), and contain only letters, numbers, and these special characters.
password.password-must-be-at-least-7-characters-l: Password must be at least 7 characters long
password.password-must-contain-at-least-one-upper: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.password-must-contain-at-least-one-numbe: Password must contain at least one number
password.password-must-contain-at-least-one-speci: Password must contain at least one special character
password.at-least-6-characters-long: Password must be at least 6 characters long

new-password.password-must-be-at-least-7-characters-l: New password must be at least 7 characters long

new-password.password-must-contain-at-least-one-numbe: New password must contain at least one number
new-password.password-must-contain-at-least-one-speci: New password must contain at least one special character
new-password.at-least-6-characters-long: New password must be at least 6 characters long

new-password-confirmation.password-must-be-at-least-7-characters-l: New password confirmation must be at least 7 characters long
